source:
Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
if 'prod' in Environment:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
else:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# ' + StorageAccount + '

#Create DataFrame for the dboorder LMS Table
dboorder = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboorder.parquet', format='parquet')
dboorder.createOrReplaceTempView("dboorder")

#Create DataFrame for the sstparcelbyorder LMS Table
sstparcelbyorder = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstparcelbyorder.parquet', format='parquet')
sstparcelbyorder.createOrReplaceTempView("sstparcelbyorder")

#Create DataFrame for the dbowaybill LMS Table
dbowaybill = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbowaybill.parquet', format='parquet')
dbowaybill.createOrReplaceTempView("dbowaybill")

#Create DataFrame for the sstparcelunion LMS 
sstparcelunion = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstparcelunion.parquet', format='parquet')
sstparcelunion.createOrReplaceTempView("sstparcelunion")

#Create DataFrame for the sstconsignmentunion LMS Table
sstconsignmentunion = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstconsignmentunion.parquet', format='parquet')
sstconsignmentunion.createOrReplaceTempView("sstconsignmentunion")

#Create DataFrame for the dboweekendholiday LMS Table
dboweekendholiday = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboweekendholiday.parquet', format='parquet')
dboweekendholiday.createOrReplaceTempView("dboweekendholiday")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storder_tmp1
AS
SELECT
    o.id as lms_order_id
    ,o.COrderNo as lms_order_corderno
    ,o.CustRef as lms_order_custref
    ,o.PickUpCustID as lms_order_pickupcustid
    ,o.DeliverCustID as lms_order_delivercustid
    ,o.BillCustID as lms_order_billcustid
    ,o.Weight as lms_order_weight
    ,o.OValue as lms_order_ovalue
    ,o.HODate as lms_order_hodate
    ,o.CService as lms_order_cservice
    ,o.CourierID as lms_order_courierid
    ,o.CustService as lms_order_custservice
    ,o.UserID as lms_order_userid
    ,o.Appointment as lms_order_appointment
    ,o.DeliverBy as lms_order_deliverby
    ,o.DConfirmed as lms_order_dconfirmed
    ,o.DComment as lms_order_dcomment
    ,o.DRefNo as lms_order_drefno
    ,o.DueDate as lms_order_duedate
    ,o.BatchNo as lms_order_batchno
    ,o.CustAccID as lms_order_custaccid
    ,o.Airfreightflag as lms_order_airfreightflag
    ,o.SpecDel as lms_order_specdel
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrweight
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrchargeweight
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrvolweight
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrvolumiserweight
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrmaxweight
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrnoparcels
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrweightexclspecdel
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrchargeweightexclspecdel
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrvolweightexclspecdel
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrvolumiserweightexclspecdel
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrmaxweightexclspecdel
    ,pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_aggrnoparcelsexclspecdel

FROM dboorder o
LEFT JOIN sstparcelbyorder pbo on pbo.lms_parcelbyorder_orderid =  o.id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storder_tmp2
AS
SELECT DISTINCT

p.orderid,
max(w.poddate) as lms_order_maxpoddate,
min(c.deliverby) as lms_order_mindeliverby

FROM  sstparcelunion p
LEFT JOIN dbowaybill w on w.id = p.waybillid
LEFT JOIN sstconsignmentunion c on c.id = p.consignid
WHERE p.orderid is not null and p.consignid is not null
GROUP BY p.orderid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storder_tmp3
AS
SELECT 
    o.*
    ,o2.lms_order_maxpoddate
    ,CASE 
	    WHEN (coalesce(o2.lms_order_maxpoddate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) <= (date(o2.lms_order_mindeliverby) + interval '86399 seconds') THEN 1
	    ELSE 0
    END lms_order_inserviceflag
    ,to_timestamp((cast(to_date(o.lms_order_hodate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')) as  lms_order_actualleaddaysstartdate
    ,coalesce(o2.lms_order_maxpoddate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS lms_order_actualleaddaysenddate
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(coalesce(o2.lms_order_maxpoddate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) - (to_unix_timestamp(to_timestamp((cast(to_date(o.lms_order_hodate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')))))/86400 as lms_order_actualleaddaysinclwe
    ,to_timestamp((cast(to_date(o.lms_order_hodate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')) lms_order_hodateroundup
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(coalesce(o2.lms_order_maxpoddate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) - to_unix_timestamp(to_timestamp((cast(to_date(o.lms_order_hodate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')))) as orderagedifferenceinseconds

FROM storder_tmp1 o
LEFT JOIN storder_tmp2 o2 ON o2.orderid = o.lms_order_id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storder_tmp4
AS
SELECT 
    o.lms_order_id
    ,sum(holiday)*86400 as holidays
FROM storder_tmp3 o
INNER JOIN dboweekendholiday h on (date(h.DateHoliday) >=  date(lms_order_actualleaddaysstartdate) and date(h.DateHoliday) <= date(lms_order_actualleaddaysenddate)) and Holiday = 1
GROUP BY o.lms_order_id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storder_tmp5
AS
SELECT 
    o.*
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(o.lms_order_actualleaddaysenddate) - to_unix_timestamp(o.lms_order_actualleaddaysstartdate) - o1.holidays)/86400  as lms_order_actualleaddays
FROM storder_tmp3 o
LEFT JOIN storder_tmp4 o1 on o1.lms_order_id = o.lms_order_id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
storder
AS
SELECT 
    *
    ,CASE 
        WHEN lms_order_hodate is null THEN 'Not Ordered'
        WHEN lms_order_maxpoddate is null THEN 'Not Delivered'
        WHEN (orderagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 12 THEN '< 12 hrs'
        WHEN (orderagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 24 THEN '< 24 hrs'
        WHEN (orderagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 48 THEN '< 2 days'
        WHEN (orderagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 72 THEN '< 3 days'
        WHEN (orderagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 96 THEN '< 4 days'
        WHEN (orderagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 120 THEN '< 5 days'
        WHEN (orderagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 144 THEN '< 6 days'
        WHEN (orderagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 168 THEN '< 7 days'
        WHEN (orderagedifferenceinseconds/3600) > 168 THEN '> 7 days'
        ELSE NULL
    END as lms_order_age

FROM storder_tmp5
